item.title: Rolling Thunder #3 Goes Gold Master
item.content_encoded: On Friday we received the proofs from the printer for Rolling Thunder #3, fixed a small error or two and sent them back. This means RT3 is now at the gold master stage (we're appropriating that term from cd pressing, btw) and we should have it back and ready to go out in around three weeks. You can check out a PDF of the Table of Contents in the meantime. Not that anyone cares or will notice, but I changed the main text and display typefaces for this issue. I feel the new look better suits the content and aids in readability thorughout, while hopefully helping to establish a signature style for our little periodical. Both new text typefaces are visible on the above-linked TOC.
